summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessement and assessement roll of Local Improvement District No. 6281 for the improvement of 37th Ave. East from East Howe St. to East Newton St.; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91938 as amended by Ordinance No. 92035, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
